robDex.util

Class Util

  • Object
    • Util

  • public class Util
extends Object
    This class is used as a set of static functions to be used by any method.
    Author:
    Nicolas Fedy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long FILE_SIZE_MAX
      Maximum size of a java file to be received by the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private Util() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void deleteDir(File file)
      Deletes a directory and its content, recursively.
      static String filterFileName(String path)
      Returns the name of the file denoted by pathname given as parameter.
      static String getclientIdentifier(Socket client)
      Returns a client identifier to differentiate between clients content.
      static List<String> getNames(List<File> files)
      Returns a list containing the names of a list of files
      static boolean isNameValid(String fileName)
      Checks if the name of the file is valid.
      static boolean isValid(String fileName, long size)
      Checks if the name and size of the file are valid.

      • deleteDir

        public static void deleteDir(File file)
        Deletes a directory and its content, recursively.
        Parameters:
        file - The directory to be deleted.

      • filterFileName

        public static String filterFileName(String path)
        Returns the name of the file denoted by pathname given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        path - The pathname from which the name of the file is to be extracted.
        Returns:
        The name of the file

      • getclientIdentifier

        public static String getclientIdentifier(Socket client)
        Returns a client identifier to differentiate between clients content.
        Parameters:
        client - The socket representing the client
        Returns:
        an Identifier for the client.

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(String fileName,
                              long size)
        Checks if the name and size of the file are valid.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file
        size - The size of the file
        Returns:
        true if the name and size are both valid, false otherwise.

      • isNameValid

        public static boolean isNameValid(String fileName)
        Checks if the name of the file is valid.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file.
        Returns:
        true if the name is valid, false otherwise.

      • getNames

        public static List<String> getNames(List<File> files)
        Returns a list containing the names of a list of files
        Parameters:
        files - The list of files from which the names are to be extracted.
        Returns:
        The list containing the names of the files
